clothing_items.fabric: heavy leather with pronounced folds and wrinkles, puffy and spongy texture, supple and thick, buttery smooth finish, padded construction, rugged and sturdy appearance; fur collar
clothing_items.details: heavy leather bomber jacket with a fur collar, zip front closure, ribbed cuffs and hem, flap pockets at the waist, and a zip pocket on the left sleeve. The jacket has a worn-in, vintage appearance.
